> This is only the Eng version.

No. This is a multi-language version. To switch to another language: open the file "vxSettings.ini" in an editor, search the section "[Language]", go to the line "Default=" and replace the word after with one of these: "English", "German", "French" or "Italian". Then save back.
Attention! Only the (cracked) execute file is at version 1.16. All other files are a mixture of 1.0, 1.10 and 1.15! So you MUST patching (except EXE) this game!
